version_description:
1. Easy to pay on bima+ with GoPay.
2. Take a look on our new menu format to ease your browsing activity.
3. Experience our new feature, in-app notification that gives you information about our latest promo.
4. Introducing our new and exciting program, H3y Star! For more info, check bima+
5. Bug fixed.

This version has new cool features:
-Easily check your remaining internet, voice and SMS quota with 1 click on the homepage.
-You can also check last 5 package purchases and last 5 top-up transactions.
-And you can stream music right in bima+.

New features for you:
1. KiKiPu, now you can transfer pulsa or internet package to your friends anytime through bima+
2. Personalization, bima+ offers package and content that suitable to your needs
3. Adding new sub-category for better bima+ experience

To get the new version, please make sure you always refresh bima+ pages by scrolling down on the page

New features for you:
1. KiKiPu, now you can transfer pulsa or internet package to your friends anytime through bima+
2. Personalization, bima+ offers package and content that suitable to your needs
3. Adding new sub-category for better bima+ experience
To get the new version, please make sure you always refresh bima+ pages by scrolling down on the page

1. Profile menu is now changed to "bima+ Account". It provides clearer information by separating information related to your SIM Card and activated packages.
2. View your transfer pulsa history through last transaction menu
3. Check your BonsTri point easier from bima+ Homepage

1.Login made easy by connecting your bima+ with your social media or email account
2.Profile menu is now changed to "bima+ Account" with much clearer information
3.You can STOP, TRANSFER, or SHARE your active packages without haste through bima+
4.View your transfer pulsa history through last transaction menu
5.Check your BonsTri point easier from bima+ Homepage
6.Bug fix

Bima Friends Forever (BFF) is a new way to enjoying business. This program is aimed to you as Tri user who are planning to start up a business and expand your network. By inviting 2 of your friends only to join BFF and you can enjoy the various benefits. Download bima+ now!

2. Take a look on our new menu format to ease your browsing activity.
3. Experience our new feature, in-app notification that gives you information about our latest promo.
4. Introducing our new and exciting program, H3y Star! For more info, check bima+
5. Bug fixed.
